Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class StandardDivinity

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.StandardDivinity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Divinity
public class StandardDivinity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Divinity
Class that is to be "decorated" with the effects of a defined divinity. It can be decorated and undecorated more than one time.

StandardDivinity contains all the information and methods of a generic divinity: its name, heading, description and number; it also has the methods corresponding to base actions that are called through the invocation of the matching function on a worker.

      number - index of the divinity as in the game

      public void updatePossibleActions​(java.util.List<Action> possibleActions)

      The standard divinity does not update the set
